name: Super Sale Showdown
description:
Being hungry never been this wild before! Fight for free food against hungry nommies and punch your way on becoming the calorie king of every supermarkets.

Background Story


In a planet far far away. There are creatures that has an appetite that far exceeds humans imagination. They call themselves, Nommies.

Due to their extremely fast reproduction ability. Their population is now going up like no other as their food supply goes down hill.

And so, their government decided to put a 100% sale and launch a purge campaign on every grocery store. And so it begins, the bloody war on every grocery store.

Controls

Player 1:

  • Move - WASD keys
  • Attack/Thrust - Space Bar

Player 2:

  • Move - Arrow keys
  • Attack/Thrust - Enter

Future Updates

This game is still under development. More features are coming in the future so be sure to follow us to keep updated on the latest news and updates about this game.

  • Racing Push Cart Upgrades
  • Controller Support
  • Unique Maps (Replace Current Map Stages with Themed Ones)
  • Unique Drops (Collectible Material per Map)

System Requirements

  • Operating System: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 8 compatible Graphics Card
  • Hard Drive: 200 MB Hard Drive space
